summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of VoltMaster Pro electrician job management app. All backend APIs (18/18) and frontend features working perfectly. Successfully tested complete New Job flow with mocked AI estimation, job management, customer management, calendar functionality, and invoice management.
passed_tests: Dashboard loads with stats (This Week Revenue, Active Jobs, Pending Quotes)
Search bar filters jobs by customer name - working perfectly
Bottom navigation (Jobs, Customers, New, Calendar, Invoices) - seamless
New Job flow: Job type selection → Scan Job Site → AI materials generation → Customer details → Job creation - COMPLETE
Job Detail page: Customer info, status timeline, tabs (Overview/Materials/Photos/Invoices) - fully functional
Generate Quote PDF button - mock working
Customers page: Add, search, delete customers - all working
Calendar page: Month navigation, day selection, job display - functional
Invoices page: View, filter by status, mark as paid - working
Create invoice from job detail page - successful
All 18 backend API endpoints - 100% success rate
Mocked AI estimation API - returning proper materials and labor hours
Mocked PDF generation API - returning success responses

success_percentage.mocked_features: 100% (AI estimation and PDF generation working as expected)
